products.title: Rimini Dove - Roller Blind
products.description: The rich simplicity of the rimini in dove is all you need for any room. Neither dark nor light, it allows just a little light to penetrate, and provides you with the privacy you need, when you need it. And this resilient, quality blind will last you well, year upon year. There aren't many colours or styles that the moderating monochrome of the dove won't work with. Set off bright reds, complement deep purples, or tame dazzling limes.

products.title: Rimini Almond - Roller Blind
products.description: The rimini almond is a classic, creamy white offering that's sure to add a touch of elegance to any room. Its fine texture makes it soft to the touch, yet it retains the durability typical of the rimini range. Combine with bold patterns for effortless period chic, or with browns, beiges, and golds for a modern, opulent look. The almond's luxurious finish will particularly suit a living room or bedroom where relaxing is the main goal, but of course would work well in any room amongst most colour schemes.

products.title: Rimini Cream - Roller Blind
products.description: By embracing the simple things in life rimini cream brings you a little touch of luxury right where you need it as you craft your interiors to reflect who you really are. A delicately woven fabric plays host to the rich and calming nature of cream as your mind drifts off to your own personal oasis. Cream works in any room where you want to add that gentle homely touch that brings the rest of your decor together.

products.title: Rimini (Blackout) Cream - Roller Blind
products.description: Who'd have thought that a beautiful cream blind could work as a blackout blind? Well, the rimini (blackout) in cream does exactly that, all while offering its creamy paleness to any window. Perfect for the bedroom or home office, this shade works wonderfully with vintage floral patterns, bold bright blues and greens, or dark, moody browns and greys. It fits equally well in a neutrally decorated room full of beiges and golds, or a pastel colour scheme full of pale pinks, dusky lilacs, or baby blues.

products.title: Trinity (Blackout) Oyster Grey - Roller Blind
products.description: If there's one addition to their trinity blackout range that we fell in love with the moment we set eyes on it then it's their oyster grey fabric. Stone greys are very much on-trend this season, and oyster allows you to gently work in one of the most popular shades whilst also breathing new life into your decor. We love the idea of combining oyster grey with simple natural tones and textures that allow the beauty of nature to come to the fore.

products.title: Trinity (Blackout) Dove - Roller Blind
products.description: When you think of a fabric that allows you to introduce some understated contemporary chic with a luxury vibe, it would be hard to think of anything other than trinity blackout dove. It's the beautiful finishing touch that no home should be without, so why hold back any longer?As you sit down and run your mind through the various different options, you need to think about how to match to your furniture.

products.title: Trinity (Blackout) Smoke - Roller Blind
products.description: Trinity (blackout) black smoke is a colour that you perhaps don't expect to find all that often, but it's certainly a welcome surprise when you find it staring right back at you. The beauty of the washed blue is that it clearly sits atop a foundation of light grey that gives it a natural stone-like quality. This is a fabric that has 'versatility' as its middle name, so why not embrace the new creative avenues that it opens? It's all about allowing your individuality to run free so that you can really put your own stamp on things.

products.title: Roma (Fr) Almond - Roller Blind
products.description: Include the sophisticated roma (fr) in almond within your home or commercial surrounding as an elegant addition with beneficial, practical elements. The modern rolling mechanism with its simple pull-cord creates a contemporary look, and the blind is formed with flame-retardant fabric to suit any surrounding. Forge a soothing and serene space by hanging the almond with a blend of neutral and wholesome tones, such as biscuit, ivory, and mocha.

products.title: Ajanta (Blackout) Cream - Roller Blind
products.description: The ajanta (blackout) in cream features an off-white abstract patterning on a barely-there, almost gold cream that shimmers gently as the light hits it. It will only be your indoors light that gets to it though, as this powerful blackout blind is every bit as effective as you'd hope at keeping outside light disturbances out. Team with rich creams and the subtlest of golds in a modern, luxurious kitchen, for which the wipe-clean fabric makes it perfect.

products.title: Crystalline Voile Cream - Roller Blind
products.description: Cream focuses on celebrating the interplay between ambient light and finely woven fabric. The subtle variations in thickness and spacing of the mesh give the fabric a life of its own that provides an extra layer of depth for your eye to explore. Use cream where you want to break up a simple monotone surface by adding a little bit of texture that won't come to the fore in the same way that an eye-catching floral pattern would.

products.title: Palermo (Blackout) Cream - Roller Blind
products.description: The palermo (blackout) in cream is a dark, dusky shade of cream, that isn't too far from magnolia. It's the perfect neutral, and what's more, it's hardy, wipe-clean, and simple to use. The high quality material and rolling mechanism of the palermo mean this blackout blind will last, year after year. Couple this rich hue with dark browns and paler creams in a warm, traditional kitchen, or use in the playroom amongst bolder, more playful colours.

products.title: Origin (Blackout) Oyster Grey - Roller Blind
products.description: Mix practicality with style by featuring the quality origin (blackout) in oyster grey within your home. Being a quality blackout blind, this blind can help you and your family to get the best night's sleep possible by blocking out the night-time light and summertime sun. Complement the delectable oyster grey with a harmonising combination of coffee and cream tones to produce a warm and welcoming room full of soothing colour.

products.title: Origin (Blackout) Magnolia - Roller Blind
products.description: Pale and neutral, the origin (blackout) in magnolia brings out the best in all colours, and sits on a soft, smooth fabric. As well as being fine and malleable, this blind is a powerful blackout fabric that is durable and will last year upon year. The magnolia will complement almost any shade, and can be used as a central feature in a brown or neutral colour scheme in a bedroom or living room. Or instead, set it amongst greens or blues for a refreshing, calming look in the bathroom.

products.title: Origin (Blackout) Spun Pearl - Roller Blind
products.description: The elegant neutrality of the origin (blackout)'s spun pearl brings warmth and sophistication wherever it's used. This taupe coloured blind is made from sturdy, high quality fabric that offers the latest in blackout technology, making it the perfect choice for keeping out harmful uv rays. The spun pearl will add style and grace to a cream and gold dcor scheme in a classic yet contemporary living room or bedroom.

products.title: Deanna Soft Cream - Roller Blind
products.description: If you're looking for a gentle, off-white cream to provide a calming, discreet background colour, but want a little bit of character to go with it, then the softly patterned deanna in soft cream is the blind for you. Ideal for a hallway in which you want to control the light without darkening the room or clashing with your existing interior dcor, this blind will work well against browns and other neutrals.

products.title: Origin (Blackout) Oyster - Roller Blind
products.description: The rich, opaque cream of the origin (blackout) in oyster gives you the best of both worlds; all of the benefits of a high quality blackout blind, while still maintaining a light, window-like feel. The smooth, hardy fabric means it's also built to last, not just for show. Cream, of course, will match almost any colour scheme, but will look particularly good in a traditionally styled neutral living room, surrounded by browns and golds, or pitted against bolder colours in a bathroom or kitchen.

products.title: Anthology Macaroon Cream - Roller Blind
products.description: Anthology macaroon cream combines an intricate countryside weave with a rich and homely creamy shade that instantly makes you feel at home. It's a subtle infusion of warmth and refinement that is just perfect when you want to add a gentle finish to any room in the house. Think about how you want to create a guest bedroom that will instantly make your visitors feel at home. A few country landscapes on the wall, warm white bulbs in the bedside lamps, and of course a few throws over the end of the bed.

products.title: Zaragoza Enoki Oyster - Roller Blind
products.description: Zaragoza enoki oyster takes the traditional silver fabrics you will have seen for years and brings them right up to date in one fell swoop. The way in which it dances with the light serves to accentuate the vitality and energy of the patterning, and adds depth to your decor like never before. Inspiration can be found in the strangest of places, but that doesn't mean you should avoid the obvious sources.

products.title: Anthology (Blackout) Macaroon Cream - Roller Blind
products.description: Our anthology range is the perfect way to integrate the functionality of a blackout blind with the aesthetics of a contemporary style you'll never want to be without again. Macaroon cream has a slightly rich and dusky element to it which we know you're instantly going to fall in love with. Country chic is a great choice to explore further if you want to add this stunning fabric to a completely new style of decor.

products.title: Linara Spc Smoke - Roller Blind
products.description: An effective dim-out blind, the linara smoke restricts light whilst avoiding the total darkness afforded by a blackout. Grey is a colour that never goes out of fashion, perhaps due to its dual functionality as both a useful neutral and a stand-alone feature colour, so this blind will last for years, through a multitude of trends. The striking contemporary greys used in the smoke will be most at home in a modern living room.

products.title: Verdi (Blackout) Smoke Embers - Roller Blind
products.description: As you wonder what to do with your decor you notice something out of the corner of your eye; it's the fabric we call smoke embers from their new verdi (blackout) range. The way in which the light blue shimmers is all down to the intricacy of the stitching, and it's a visual you'll remember for many years to come. If you want to be able to elevate the dining room to the space you love to host your friends and family in it's all about adding refined luxurious touches.

products.title: Verdi (Blackout) Pearl River - Roller Blind
products.description: Verdi (blackout) pearl river is a fabric that seems to flow out of the page and meet you head on. The beauty of it is that it combines a subtle blue background that sits gently where you place it, with an eye-catching pattern that demands to be seen. This is luxury on a whole other level. Taking the dining room and turning it into your own function room that is filled with friends and family night after night is something we all dream of doing.

products.title: Osborne Smoke - Roller Blind
products.description: The osborne smoke is a modern reinterpretation of a classically patterned design that takes its inspiration from the beautiful free-flowing forms of natural plant-life. A gentle grey is used to print the design onto the off-white background, giving this version of the osborne a lovely, smoky aesthetic. The smoke works beautifully as a lightener in rooms where darker features dominate, without challenging the existing colour scheme.

products.title: Riviera Stripe Smoke - Roller Blind
products.description: The riviera stripe smoke is a top quality, lightweight fabric, woven into the most contemporary of modern and eye-catching designs. Giving a full range of grey shades from charcoal, through fashionable stone greys, to a simple and pure off-white, the smoke is sure to be a great addition to your home. The colours on offer in the smoke work well as a way of adding a real depth of colour to a lightly decorated living room or front hallway.

products.title: Astral Ivory - Roller Blind
products.description: Take a closer look at astral ivory and you come to appreciate the subtle way in which the leaves twist and turn across the fabric. They have an elegant and timeless feel to them - one which will add depth and clarity to your decor like never before. If you want to introduce a spark of creative inspiration to the dining room, combine ivory with some dark tableware and wall art to provide a strong contrast.
